Button.Name: AdjustVerticalLetterbox
Button.OnActivate: Parent.LeftBlackPage.Visible=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.LetterboxOptions.VerticalLetterboxEnabled.Text Parent.RightBlackPage.Visible=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.LetterboxOptions.VerticalLetterboxEnabled.Text Parent.LeftBlackPage.Width=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.LetterboxOptions.LeftWidth.Text Parent.RightBlackPage.Width=Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.LetterboxOptions.RightWidth.Text Data=Parent.Width-Parent.Parent.Parent.Custom.ProfitUI_MiscSettings.LetterboxOptions.RightWidth.Text Parent.RightBlackPage.Location=Data ## ',0' Data=Parent.RightBlackPage.Left - 5 COND=Parent.TopBlackPage.Visible==true Parent.TopBlackPage.Height=COND ? Parent.TopBlackPage.Height : 0 Parent.RightFrame.Location=Data ## ',' ## Parent.TopBlackPage.Height Data=Parent.Height - Parent.TopBlackPage.Height Data=Data - Parent.TopBlackPage.Height Data=Data + 1 Parent.RightFrame.Height=Data Parent.LeftFrame.Height=Data Data=Parent.LeftBlackPage.Width - 5 Parent.LeftFrame.Location=Data ## ',' ## Parent.TopBlackPage.Height Activated=false
